name: Rayden_ (Lusófona Games: Arcade Room)
description:
Rayden_ is a 3D Cyberpunk themed game where your story as Nova begins by breaking free from Zener Corporation.

As a Raijin God ancestor in Noxstorm City, they want to weaponize your gifted powers.

Darker and deeper secrets lie in the shadows for you to unravel; like your mothers’ disappearance.

Nariko, Nova’s mother, was caring but very protective as she warned her about the dangers of her special abilities as a Raijin Ancestor, the God of Rain, Thunder and Storms.

Now seeing herself in this dangerous situation, Nova remembers how her mother told her that Oryn, the Arashi Temple Highest Priest, would offer her protection in the event she ever needed shelter, the only place of the city that Zener or any Noxstorm politician has no power nor influence over.  

To reach the Temple in the Arashi District, Nova will have to fight countless Zener Agents while making her way through the neon city lights of Noxstorm, which won't stop for anything on their mission to capture her.

To survive and fight of her enemies, Nova has 3 abilities she can use being these:

                                      🌧 🌧 🌧                              Azura                             🌧 🌧 🌧

   ϟ Theme: Water

   ϟ  Cooldown: 10 seconds

   ϟ Heal to Nova per use: 25 % of health

                                      🌩 🌩 🌩                              Astra                              🌩 🌩 🌩

   ϟ Theme: Thunder

   ϟ Cooldown: 2 seconds

   ϟ Damage to Enemies per hit: 15% of health

   ϟ Damage to Nova per use: 7 % of health

                                      🌪 🌪 🌪                              Aerisa                             🌪 🌪 🌪

   ϟ Theme: Storm

   ϟ Cooldown: 2 seconds

   ϟ Damage to Enemies per hit: 35% of health

   ϟ Damage to Nova per use: 12 % of health

For more information about the Gameplay, Mechanics & Story, check the documentation bellow.

We hope you enjoy playing Rayden_!
